name: Zoksh Crypto Payment Gateway for WooCommerce
author: a@zoksh.com

sections.description:
Zoksh

Accept payments anytime, anywhere, in any currency.
Completely non-custodial. Truly no-code. Zero chargebacks.

Your assets and money remain yours, we help you manage them without any fuss. Get the simplicity and convenience of a single platform to manage your payments.

https://zoksh.com

Key features

  • 190+ Cryptocurrencies and multiple chains
  • Complete control of your money and assets
  • No-code integration, non-custodial, real-time settlement
  • Insights and analysis to help you strategize
  • Settle your accounts and reconcile in real-time
  • Benefit from more efficient online payment processing
  • Minimize fees, increase security, and open more opportunities

Requirements

  • Zoksh account
  • An installed Woocommerce plugin

Plugin installation

  1. Upload the zoksh-payment-gateway-for-woocommerce directory to the /wp-content/plugins/directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.

After the plugin is activated, Zoksh will appear in the WooCommerce>Payments section.

Plugin configuration

After you have installed the plugin, the configuration steps are:

  1. On the WooCommerce “Settings” page, go to the “Payment Gateways” tab, then click “Zoksh”
  2. Check “Enable Zoksh” and enter your Zoksh Api Key & Secret.
  3. Click “Save changes” and the gateway will be active.

Support

support@zoksh.com
